title: Study questions
content: How to study in engineering in pesu.i know by opening book don't tell me that . Like I heard textbooks are not given .like will pesu give notes or something. Please tell üôè üôè üôè

comments.body:
Textbooks are never given in any school/college. You need to buy them if you wish

PESU wont give notes. The teachers working for PESU will give notes.
You'll get it once your classes begin in your semester planner.
Oh then i should know about book stores near me then to buy these textbooks
now i should tell you about the book stores near you also? /s
No no bro i am not that shameless just asked
Guys people have answered it previously please refer that omg
buy online, books are generally cheaper online, who still goes to bookstores.
